page.title: 09THE NEW INN,WESTERLEIGH
page.content: We are fascinated to see that Westerleigh has a{"New Inn" and "Ye {Olde Inne"}.The landlord,only there for 18 months so far,does not know how old the building is but{it does not {look very new to us!}He really enjoys his work and sees it more as a relaxing social life. {Mondays and Saturdays are the {busiest times}and the landlord spends a lot of time preparing food for{bar {snacks}and the{restaurant}.In winter he finds that most of the customers are local people but in the summer more people visit from elsewhere .He says that the more people drink the funnier they act and he sometimes has to ask them to leave early. When we visited the pub the record player was on very loud and{people {seemed to be enjoying themselves.
